name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="level" value="info" />
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="RETURNEDERRORMSG" value="`$aai-error-message`"/>

name: get-resource: A&AI Data for VNFC Name
record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="VM data not found in request"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Insert to AnAI Request Failed"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name`"/>

name: set: Append to aai error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="aai-error-message" value="`'Insert to A&AI Failed for ' + $request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name + '.' + $aai-error-message`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>

<parameter name="VNFCNAME" value="`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name`"/>

<parameter name="VMNAME" value="`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vm-name`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="VNFC data not in request"/>

name: get-resource: A&AI Data for VM Name
set: Append to aai-error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="aai-error-message" value="`'Get from A&AI Failed for ' + $request-parameters.vm[$j].vm-name + '.' + $aai-error-message`"/>

name: set: Append to aai-error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="aai-error-message" value="`'VM Info not found in request.' + $aai-error-message`"/>

name: set: Append to aai-error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="aai-error-message" value="`'VNFC Info not found in request.' + $aai-error-message`"/>

name: save Put VNFC
xml:
<save plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='vnfc' key='vnfc-name = $request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name' force='true' pfx='tmp.vnfc-sys-controller'>
<parameter name='vnfc-function-code' value='`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-function-code`'/>
<parameter name='vnfc-type' value='`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-type`'/>
<parameter name='ipaddress-v4-oam-vip' value='`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].ipaddress-v4-oam-vip`'/>
<parameter name='prov-status' value='`$tmp.aai-prov-status`'/>
<parameter name='orchestration-status' value='`$tmp.aai-orch-status`'/>
<parameter name='in-maint' value = 'false'/>
<parameter name='is-closed-loop' value = 'false'/>
<parameter name='group-notation' value='`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].group-notation`'/>


<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].related-to" value="vserver" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[0].relationship-key"   value="vserver.vserver-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[0].relationship-value" value='`$tmp.aai-data-vm.vserver-id`'/>


<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[1].relationship-key"   value="tenant.tenant-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[1].relationship-value" value='`$tmp.aai-data-vm.tenant-id`'/>

<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[2].relationship-key"   value="cloud-region.cloud-owner" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[2].relationship-value" value="att-aic"/>

<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[3].relationship-key"   value="cloud-region.cloud-region-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[3].relationship-value" value='`$tmp.aai-data-vm.cloud-region-id`'/>


<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[1].related-to" value="generic-vnf" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[1].relationship-data[0].relationship-key"   value="generic-vnf.vnf-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[1].relationship-data[0].relationship-value" value='`$vnf-id`'/>

<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[2].related-to" value="vf-module" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[2].relationship-data[0].relationship-key"   value="generic-vnf.vnf-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[2].relationship-data[0].relationship-value" value='`$vnf-id`'/>

<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[2].relationship-data[1].relationship-key"   value="vf-module.vf-module-id" />
<parameter name="relationship-list.relationship[2].relationship-data[1].relationship-value" value='`$tmp.vf-module-id`'/>

name: execute saveTxLog
xml:
<execute plugin="org.onap.appc.data.services.node.ConfigResourceNode" method="saveConfigTransactionLog">
<parameter name="messageType" value="log" />
<parameter name="message" value="`'501:' + $aai-error-message`" />
<parameter name="responsePrefix" value="tmp.saveTxLog" />

name: update: A&AI Data for VNFC status update
xml:
<update plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource" resource="vnfc" key="vnfc-name = $request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name" pfx="tmp.aai-data-vnfc-update" >
<parameter name='vnfc-name' value='`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name`'/>
<parameter name='prov-status' value='`$tmp.aai-prov-status`'/>
<parameter name='orchestration-status' value='`$tmp.aai-orch-status`'/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Update VNFC status to AnAI Request Failed"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name`"/>
<parameter name="field4" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnfc-update`"/>

name: set: Append to aai error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="aai-error-message" value="`'Update VNFC status to A&AI Failed for ' + $request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name + '.' + $aai-error-message`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Update VNFC status to AnAI Request Success"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$request-parameters.vm[$j].vnfc[$k].vnfc-name`"/>
<parameter name="field4" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnfc-update`"/>
